name: Inventory
description: Represents a storage system for Items within the game world.
overview: The Inventory class allows for the management of ItemStacks. It supports fixed capacities, adding/removing items, and checking for containment. It is used by Player and Chest classes to manage contents.

constructors.description: Creates a new empty inventory with a specific size and title.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of slots in the inventory. Must be a multiple of 9.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The display title of the inventory UI.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Stores the given items in the inventory. This will try to fill existing stacks and empty slots as well as it can.

methods.name: deserialize
methods.signature: public static Inventory deserialize(Map<String, Object> args)
methods.description: Deserializes an inventory from a map structure.
